min_conc_threshold_source: Castro A. et al. (2023), DOI: 10.5451/unibas-ep96059, URL: https://edoc.unibas.ch/96059/
crf_source: Brunekreef B. et al. (2022): A proposal for sensitivity analyses of the health impacts of PM2.5 and NO2 in Europe, in support of the revision of the EU ambient Air Quality Standards for these pollutants. European Respiratory Society (ERS) and International Society for Environmental Epidemiology (ISEE)
comment: premature deaths are based on all-cause natural mortality covering all age classes in this case; "crf" (= conentration response function) linearity assumed; "min_conc_threshold" = minimum observed concentration yields outcomes due to anthropogenic pollution; see also Castro A. et al. (2023), DOI: 10.5451/unibas-ep96059, URL: https://edoc.unibas.ch/96059/ and Castro A, et al. (2023),DOI: 10.5451/unibas-ep96243, URL: https://edoc.unibas.ch/96243/
